required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: To Explore the Pharmacokinetics and Relative Bioavailability of Sulfatinib Capsules in Two Different Manufacturers
clinical_study.official_title: To Explore the Pharmacokinetics and Relative Bioavailability of Sulfatinib Capsules in Two Different Manufacturers in Chinese Adult Male Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single-center, randomized, open, single-dose, three-cycle cross-design study, which will be only enrolled Chinese male healthy volunteers.

detailed_description.textblock: 27-30 Chinese male healthy volunteers will be enrolled to assess the pharmacokinetic profile and relative bioavailability of 300 mg (50 mg x 6) Sulfatinib capsules of single dose orally in two different manufacturers after breakfast. All subjects are required to collect PK blood samples before and after administration at the following time points: within 1 hour before administration, 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 12, 24, 36, 48, 72, 96 hours after administration (16 times point), each collection of venous blood is 2mL.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Eligible subjects who did not meet the exclusion criteria were randomly assigned to one of the three groups: group A, B, and C (administration TRR, RTR and RRT, 9 subjects in each group, where T is the test formulation and R is the reference formulation) .

primary_outcome.measure: The area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC) from 0 to the time of the last measurable concentration (AUCt) of Sulfatinib
primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured on the Cycle1 Day1 to Day5, Cycle2 Day1 to Day5, Cycle3 Day1 to Day5
primary_outcome.description: The area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC) from 0 to the time of the last measurable concentration.

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum observed plasma concentration (Cmax) of Sulfatinib
primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured on the Cycle1 Day1 to Day5, Cycle2 Day1 to Day5, Cycle3 Day1 to Day5
primary_outcome.description: Maximum observed concentration, occurring at Tmax.

primary_outcome.measure: The time to Cmax (peak time, Tmax) of Sulfatinib
primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured on the Cycle1 Day1 to Day5, Cycle2 Day1 to Day5, Cycle3 Day1 to Day5
primary_outcome.description: The time at which maximum plasma concentration (Cmax) is observed.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured on the Cycle1 Day1 to Day5, Cycle2 Day1 to Day5, Cycle3 Day1 to Day5
primary_outcome.description: The time required for the concentration of the drug to reach half of its original value.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured on the Cycle1 Day1 to Day5, Cycle2 Day1 to Day5, Cycle3 Day1 to Day5
primary_outcome.description: This term represents the relationship between the bioavailability of a substance in two different media.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured from the date signed ICF to within 14 days after the last dose
secondary_outcome.description: AE monitoring will be assessed by incidence of AEs, AE grading, serious AEs, as well as laboratory determinations and vital sign parameters.

arm_group.description: The subjects in this arm will receive sulfatinib T capsules from Hutchison Whampoa Pharmaceutical (Suzhou) Co., Ltd.
The subjects in this arm will receive sulfatinib R capsules from Beijing Yiling Bioengineering Technology Co., Ltd.

intervention.description: Sulfatinib T capsules were produced by Hutchison Whampoa Pharmaceutical (Suzhou) Co., Ltd. production.
Sulfatinib R capsules were produced by Beijing Yiling Bioengineering Technology Co., Ltd.
